rcis 0.2.8
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Helper functions

    Short functions written to help perform basic operations in class.

    add_ci() plot_ci()
    Generate 95% confidence intervals
    err.rate.rf() err.rate.tree()
    Calculate error rate for a classification model
    logit2prob()
    Convert log-odds to predicted probabilities
    mse() mse_vec()
    Mean squared error
    prob2logodds()
    Convert probabilities to log-odds
    prob2odds()
    Convert predicted probabilities to log-odds
    xaringan()
    xaringan

    Notes/slides

    Functions to generate custom formatted R Markdown notes and slides.

    cfss_notes()
    cfss_notes
    cfss_slides()
    cfss_slides
    xaringan_wide()
    xaringan_wide
    base_size
    Default base size for ggplot objects

    Datasets

    Datasets for in-class exercises, homework assignments, and demonstrations

    bechdel
    Bechdel test
    cps
    Chicago Public Schools school ratings
    dadmom
    Dadmom
    emotion
    Emotion scores from 2016 presidential debate
    gss
    GSS dataset for in-class exercise
    gss_colrac
    GSS dataset for in-class exercise
    gun_deaths
    Gun Deaths in America
    mass_shootings
    US Mass Shootings
    mental_health
    Voter turnout and mental health
    police_shootings
    Police usage of deadly force in the United States
    publishers
    Publishers
    scorecard
    College affordability from College Scorecard
    superheroes
    Superheroes
    worldbank
    World Bank indicators
    USCongress
    A sample dataset containing labeled bills from the United State Congress.
